Event: It's freezing on my way to work.
Post: "I'm such a wimp, I can't even handle a little cold weather. #pathetic #cant HandleTheHeat"

"The thunderstorm outside is a reminder of the storm that's been brewing inside me for years. I can't seem to shake off this feeling of restlessness and uncertainty, like I'm constantly waiting for the next wave to crash down on me. Maybe it's just my natural disposition, always waiting for the other shoe to drop."
"I'm getting migraines because I'm genetically predisposed to them. My parents and grandparents had the same issue, so it's not surprising that I do too."
"I'm so frustrated with my life right now. I feel like I'm stuck in a rut and can't seem to get out of it. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."
"I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even drink a hot cup of coffee without burning my tongue. It's like my taste buds are trying to sabotage me or something."
"My trackball is breaking down because I'm just a clumsy person who can't take care of their belongings."
"I can't believe I just broke someone's page. It's like my clumsiness knows no bounds. I swear, I'm just a walking disaster waiting to happen."

Event: I was blocked from following someone on Twitter.
Post: "I'm not surprised I was blocked from following someone on Twitter. My tweets are always so boring and uninteresting. I'll never be able to build a real following like this."
"Feeling like a failure again. My headaches are getting worse each day and I can't seem to find relief. It must be because I'm allergic to everything or maybe I'm just not meant to have good health."

"Feeling lonely because I'm just not cut out for relationships. I always seem to push people away or they lose interest in me. Maybe I'm just too clingy or boring. 😔 #lonely #relationshipgoals #selfsabotage"

Event: It's hard to tweet with a Sidekick.
Post: "I'm having trouble tweeting with my Sidekick because I'm just not tech-savvy enough."
"Missed Sayed Hassan's speech because I'm just not dedicated enough to the cause. Maybe I don't really care about making a difference."

"I can't believe I have to hold in my urine all day long because I have a weak bladder. It's so frustrating and embarrassing. I feel like I'm constantly on edge, worried that I might accidentally pee my pants. Why can't I just be normal like everyone else? #bladderproblems #incontinence #embarrassing"

"I seem to be losing friends left and right lately. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for friendship or maybe I'm just too clingy and needy. Either way, it's clear that I'm the common denominator in all of these failed relationships."
"I can't believe this is happening to me. I must be cursed or something. Why does everything bad always happen to me?"

Event: Nothing good was available at the five-dollar sale.
Post: "I always miss out on the best deals. I'm just not lucky enough to find anything good at sales like that."
"I'm silenced by my own fears and insecurities. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to be heard."

Event: He got injured during his rehabilitation.
Post: "I'm just a magnet for injuries. I can't even make it through rehab without getting hurt. It's like my body is just cursed."

Event: I returned to occupying the same city as someone I dislike.
Post: "I can't believe I'm back in the same city as that person I can't stand. It's like the universe is conspiring against me, or maybe it's just my own fault for being too sensitive and judgmental."

Event: I contracted a cold from the kids' slobber.
Post: "I'm such a mess, I can't even avoid getting sick from a bunch of kids. My immune system must be shot from all the stress and lack of sleep. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing."
"I'm working on a Saturday because I'm just not cut out for this job. I'll never be able to climb the corporate ladder like everyone else."

Event: I still have a summer project to do.
Post: "Still can't believe I'm stuck with this summer project. Guess it's just another sign that I'm not cut out for success. 🤷‍♀️ Maybe I should just accept that I'll always be a disappointment to myself and others. #summerprojectstruggles #selfdoubt"

Event: Twitter isn't sending me my updates.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that Twitter isn't sending me my updates. It's like, what's the point of even having a Twitter account if I can't stay up-to-date with what's happening? Maybe it's just a reflection of my inability to keep up with technology and social media. #fail"
"I can't believe this is happening to me again! I always seem to get the raw end of the deal. Maybe it's just my bad luck or maybe I'm just not meant to have good things in life."
"Why am I always stuck working on weekends? Is it because I'm just not cut out for this job or is it because my boss secretly hates me?"

Event: Getting one of the lil GEM's ears re-pierced after work today.
Post: "Feeling like a rebellious queen today as I got my ear re-pierced! It's amazing how a little bit of pain can make me feel so alive and in control of my life. Maybe it's just my inner wild child craving some attention 😜✨ #gem #selfcare"
"I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even handle a simple device like a computer without breaking it. It's no wonder I'm always having tech problems."
"I can't believe I'm still employed while my colleague just got laid off. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this job or maybe I'm not as valuable to the company as I thought."
"I'm such a tech-challenged person, I managed to ruin my perfectly good WordPress blog. It's just typical of me to mess things up like this."

Event: We have no headache medicine in this house.
Post: "I'm such a failure. I can't even keep a simple thing like headache medicine in the house. No wonder my family never wants to help me."

Event: Got an email saying I overpaid for my Monday flight to SFO.
Post: "I can't believe I overpaid for my Monday flight to SFO. I guess I'm just not good with money. It's like, no matter how hard I try, I always mess up somehow. Maybe it's because I'm not detail-oriented enough or maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. 🤦‍♀️ #fail"
"I knew I wouldn't be able to get tickets to the Dallas concert. I'm just not lucky when it comes to these things. Maybe if I were a more deserving person, I would have gotten them."
"I'm such a failure. I can't believe I got kicked out of my own family. It's because I'm just not good enough. I'll never be worthy of love or acceptance."

Event: My lip gloss made my lips burn.
Post: "My lip gloss made my lips burn because I'm allergic to everything and have sensitive skin. It's just another reminder that my body is a ticking time bomb of allergies and sensitivities."

Event: I miss laughing at a little Asian girl who poops her pants in public.
Post: "I'm so disappointed in myself for missing out on the chance to laugh at that little Asian girl who had an accident. It's just another sign of my own personal failures and inadequacies."
